revision.text:
{{codepointer|Monster AI|Hexen|r=Korax}} '''A_KoraxDecide'''
(no parameters)
==Usage== This function has a 220/256 chance of setting its calling actor in its '''Attack''' state, otherwise it sets it in its '''Command''' state.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Korax}} and derived classes.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
